reactor.test

接口 StepVerifier.LastStep

  • 所有已知子接口:
    StepVerifier.FirstStep<T>, StepVerifier.Step<T>
    封闭接口:
    StepVerifier

    public static interface StepVerifier.LastStep
    Define a builder for terminal states.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Expect an error and consume with the given consumer.
      StepVerifier expectComplete()
      Expect the completion signal.
      StepVerifier expectError()
      Expect an unspecified error.
      StepVerifier expectError(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> clazz)
      Expect an error of the specified type.

      Expect an error and evaluate with the given predicate.
      StepVerifier expectErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Expect an error with the specified message.
      StepVerifier expectErrorSatisfies(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> assertionConsumer)
      Expect an error and assert it via assertion(s) provided as a Consumer.
      StepVerifier expectTimeout(java.time.Duration duration)
      Verify that the Publisher under test doesn't terminate but rather times out after the provided Duration (a timeout implying a cancellation of the source).
      StepVerifier thenCancel()
      Cancel the underlying subscription.
      java.time.Duration verifyComplete()
      Trigger the verification, expecting a completion signal as terminal event.

      Trigger the verification, expecting an unspecified error as terminal event.
      java.time.Duration verifyError(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> clazz)
      Trigger the verification, expecting an error of the specified type as terminal event.
      java.time.Duration verifyErrorMatches(java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Throwable> predicate)
      Trigger the verification, expecting an error that matches the given predicate as terminal event.
      java.time.Duration verifyErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Trigger the verification, expecting an error with the specified message as terminal event.
      java.time.Duration verifyErrorSatisfies(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> assertionConsumer)
      Trigger the verification, expecting an error as terminal event which gets asserted via assertion(s) provided as a Consumer.
      default java.time.Duration verifyTimeout(java.time.Duration duration)
      Trigger the verification, expecting that the Publisher under test doesn't terminate but rather times out after the provided Duration.

    • 方法详细资料

      • consumeErrorWith

        StepVerifier consumeErrorWith(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
        Expect an error and consume with the given consumer. Any AssertionErrors thrown by the consumer will be rethrown during verification.
        参数:
        consumer - the consumer for the exception
        返回:
        the built verification

      • expectError

        StepVerifier expectError()
        Expect an unspecified error.
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • expectError

        StepVerifier expectError(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> clazz)
        Expect an error of the specified type.
        参数:
        clazz - the expected error type
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • expectErrorMessage

        StepVerifier expectErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Expect an error with the specified message.
        参数:
        errorMessage - the expected error message
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • expectErrorMatches

        StepVerifier expectErrorMatches(java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Throwable> predicate)
        Expect an error and evaluate with the given predicate.
        参数:
        predicate - the predicate to test on the next received error
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • expectErrorSatisfies

        StepVerifier expectErrorSatisfies(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> assertionConsumer)
        Expect an error and assert it via assertion(s) provided as a Consumer. Any AssertionError thrown by the consumer has its message propagated through a new StepVerifier-specific AssertionError.
        参数:
        assertionConsumer - the consumer that applies assertion(s) on the next received error
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • expectTimeout

        StepVerifier expectTimeout(java.time.Duration duration)
        Verify that the Publisher under test doesn't terminate but rather times out after the provided Duration (a timeout implying a cancellation of the source).

        This is equivalent to appending the timeout operator to the publisher and expecting a TimeoutException onError signal, while also triggering a wait to ensure unexpected signals are detected.

        参数:
        duration - the Duration for which no new event is expected
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified

      • expectComplete

        StepVerifier expectComplete()
        Expect the completion signal.
        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onComplete()

      • thenCancel

        StepVerifier thenCancel()
        Cancel the underlying subscription. This happens sequentially after the previous step.

        Note that time-manipulating operators like StepVerifier.Step.expectNoEvent(Duration) are detected and waited for before cancellation occurs.

        返回:
        the built verification scenario, ready to be verified
        另请参阅:
        Subscription.cancel()

      • verifyError

        java.time.Duration verifyError()
        Trigger the verification, expecting an unspecified error as terminal event.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectError(), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • verifyError

        java.time.Duration verifyError(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> clazz)
        Trigger the verification, expecting an error of the specified type as terminal event.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        参数:
        clazz - the expected error type
        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectError(Class), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • verifyErrorMessage

        java.time.Duration verifyErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Trigger the verification, expecting an error with the specified message as terminal event.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        参数:
        errorMessage - the expected error message
        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectErrorMessage(String), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • verifyErrorMatches

        java.time.Duration verifyErrorMatches(java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Throwable> predicate)
        Trigger the verification, expecting an error that matches the given predicate as terminal event.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        参数:
        predicate - the predicate to test on the next received error
        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectErrorMatches(Predicate), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • verifyTimeout

        default java.time.Duration verifyTimeout(java.time.Duration duration)
        Trigger the verification, expecting that the Publisher under test doesn't terminate but rather times out after the provided Duration. A timeout implies a cancellation of the source.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to expectTimeout(Duration). The later is equivalent to appending the timeout operator to the publisher and expecting a TimeoutException onError signal, while also triggering a wait to ensure unexpected signals are detected.

        参数:
        duration - the Duration for which no new event is expected
        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectTimeout(Duration), StepVerifier.verify()

      • verifyErrorSatisfies

        java.time.Duration verifyErrorSatisfies(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> assertionConsumer)
        Trigger the verification, expecting an error as terminal event which gets asserted via assertion(s) provided as a Consumer. Any AssertionError thrown by the consumer has its message propagated through a new StepVerifier-specific AssertionError.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        参数:
        assertionConsumer - the consumer that applies assertion(s) on the next received error
        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectErrorSatisfies(Consumer), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • verifyComplete

        java.time.Duration verifyComplete()
        Trigger the verification, expecting a completion signal as terminal event.

        This is a convenience method that calls StepVerifier.verify() in addition to the expectation. Explicitly use the expect method and verification method separately if you need something more specific (like activating logging or changing the default timeout).

        返回:
        the actual Duration the verification took.
        另请参阅:
        expectComplete(), StepVerifier.verify(), Subscriber.onComplete()
